tool_description: Fetch well known quotes from more than 500 movies. Search through movie quotes by actors, characters, movies, genres, years and even pieces of quotes. Intuitive API interface navigation. Github repository: https://github.com/juanroldan1989/movie-quotes-api
name: MovieQuotes
title: MovieQuotes

api_list.name: Quotes
api_list.description: Fetch well known quotes from more than 500 movies.

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Filter quotes by year or years.
